recipe.title: Mango Rum Batida
ingredients: 1/4 cup sanding (also called decorative) or granulated sugar
1 ripe mango, peeled and cut into chunks (1 cup)
instructions: Rub lime wedge around outer rims of 4 glasses. Spread sugar in a saucer, then dip glasses in sugar to coat rims.
Make batidas: Blend batida ingredients in a blender until smooth and thick, about 1 minute. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
